attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: Atrocious user experience. Who designed this app? Not user friendly, very difficult to use, I had to get my glasses and it still wouldn’t register my fingers. With all his money you would think Donald could provide a better app. What the heck.

attributes.title: “Why do black people commit 50% of the crimes if they only take up 13% of the population🥴???”
attributes.review: Black neighborhoods are over policed so of corse they have higher rates of crime. And white perpetrators are undercharged so of corse they have lower rates of crime! And all those stats your talking about, are operating off a small sample size! Soo shuuuuuuuuut up!

attributes.title: CHARGED MULTIPLE TIMES WITHOUT PERMISSION
attributes.review: After giving my credit card information for a one time $50 dollar contribution, I was charged $50 every week for 2 months. I tried contacting the support team but they would not help and I had to cancel my credit card.

attributes.title: So disappointed
attributes.review: Fellow trump supporters the app is extremely slow and terrible to the point that it makes my hand cramp up and have a heart attack is so bad. I FaceTimed trump and he agreed that the app is horrible and very uncomfortable to use/work I think it should be deleted ✨💔💕💔💕💔💔💔💔💕💔💕🥰🥰🥰💔💕🥰💙💙💙💎💙💙💎

attributes.title: Love it
attributes.review: I share this App to all of my friends and family and they are all love it

attributes.title: very disgusted
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i know that trump is a very nice man and wanted to help with his campaign. after downloading said app i found out it was stealing all of my information and realized that trump is actually very racist, homophobic, fascist, and not to mention just plain ignorant. this app also drains my battery life and takes up more and more data the longer i keep it on my phone. i was going to vote for trump but now i’m going to settle for biden. very disgusted with the trump administration.

attributes.title: So bad!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and it makes my phone freeze up! Not only that, I can’t even get information from it because it crashes every time it opens!!! So sad to rate it one star, but you gotta do what you gotta do 😞☹️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app made my phone LAG and five minutes later, IT CRASHED! mind you my phone was completely charged and i normally don’t have apps running in the background. before my phone was basically new and now it’s slow as hell :(

attributes.title: Worst app ever in the history of apps
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep current with my president. This app took a long time to download and kept freezing and crashing, difficult log in and spam my email. Deleted instantly!

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: This an extremely poor quality application. It crashes every other time I launch it. It also uses a ton of power for some reason... Once I open the app, my battery depletes almost immediately.
